name: IPacketFlowExtension
description: Extension for PacketFlow to add some utility methods.

methods.name: self
methods.description: Returns the PacketFlow this extension is applied to.

methods.name: isClientbound
methods.description: Returns an indication of whether this PacketFlow is clientbound.

methods.name: isServerbound
methods.description: Returns an indication of whether this PacketFlow is serverbound.

methods.name: getReceptionSide
methods.description: Returns the LogicalSide that is receiving packets in this PacketFlow .
